content.en: Algorithmic design: Researchers have explored various aspects of the design process and how algorithms can contribute to it. They have investigated the formalism for studying design, the combination of AI techniques to develop effective heuristics, the use of exploration and association to generate innovative solutions, and the application of expert systems in engineering design. They have also examined the structure of design spaces, the implications of design support systems, and the strengths and limitations of different approaches. Overall, algorithms play a crucial role in problem-solving and advancing the field of design.
content.da: Algoritmisk design: Forskere har udforsket forskellige aspekter af designprocessen og hvordan algoritmer kan bidrage til den. De har undersøgt formalismen for studiet af design, kombinationen af AI-teknikker til at udvikle effektive heuristikker, brugen af udforskning og association til at generere innovative løsninger, samt anvendelsen af ekspert- systemer i ingeniørdesign. De har også undersøgt strukturen af designrum, implikationerne af designsupportsystemer og styrkerne og begrænsningerne ved forskellige tilgange. Overordnet spiller algoritmer en afgørende rolle i problemløsning og fremskridt inden for designfeltet.
